name: HYSO
tag_list: door-knob, door-handle, disinfect, clean, green, hygiene, health, public-health, d3-micro, hyscent
overview:
HYSO is committed to providing creative and practical â€œHygienic Solutionsâ€ to common public health and hygiene issues.

HYSO develops products that are both aesthetically pleasing and scientifically supported. Because HYSO is dedicated to ensuring that its products are cost-effective and environmentally conscious, the company is able to reach a diverse community of institutions and establishments worldwide. With distribution offices in North America, South America, Europe, Asia and Africa, HYSO is becoming the standard in facilities across the globe.

HYSO’s flagship product, the HYSO D3 Micro, is the only Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) approved device for automatically disinfecting door handles. The HYSO D3 Micro provides the solution to a global problem by helping to prevent the cross-contamination of germs at a critical contact point - the door handle.

HYSO also recently launched the HYScent, a green odor control unit that uses pure essential oils. By utilizing EVA technology, HYScent conforms to the most stringent VOC legislation in the United States.

Founded in 2005, HYSO LLC is a privately-owned company based in New York. In 2007, the company established HYSO International Ltd., a UK-based subsidiary, to run its European, Asian, Middle Eastern and African operations.
